iiv.io

Class CNUEcatImgFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.data.CNUData
      • iiv.io.CNUImgFile
        • iiv.io.CNUEcatImgFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CNUConversionTypes, CNUFileObject, iiVScriptable

    public class CNUEcatImgFile
extends CNUImgFile
    Class that handles ECAT files as image data.
    See Also:
    CNUImgFile

      • buildEcatFileName

        public static String buildEcatFileName(String filename)
        Builds an ECAT file name (ie filename with .img, .scn, .atn, or .nrm extension). Also re-attaches .gz for compressed files
        Parameters:
        filename - filename with or without appropriate extension
        Returns:
        filename with appropriate extension

      • readBlock

        public static byte[] readBlock(InputStream inS,
                               byte[] block,
                               int offset,
                               int count)
                        throws IOException
        Reads a standard sized block of bytes from an input stream.
        Parameters:
        inS - input stream
        block - array to read into. If null an new array will be created of size offset + CNUEcatHeader.MatBLKSIZE.
        offset - offset into array to start read into if < 0 set to 0
        count - number of bytes to read if < 0 set to block.length - offset
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown on errors reading from the file.

      • ReadImg

        public void ReadImg(InputStream inS)
             throws IOException
        Reads the data from the file ignoring dims.
        Parameters:
        inS - input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown on errors reading from the file.

                 throws IOException

        Parameters:
